properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 1:18PM PST until February 3 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...8 to 10 ft easing to 7 to 8 ft Monday.

- FIRST EBB...Around 1045 PM Sunday. Seas around 13 ft.
Breakers possible.

- SECOND EBB...Around 1145 AM Monday. Seas around 12 ft.
Breakers possible.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...Small craft through 1 AM Monday followed by a decrease in
seas until 8 AM Monday. Small craft from 8 AM to 3 PM Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST MONDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 3 PM PST MONDAY
